<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Defiance Unto Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=980) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Access**
Spiresworn elf

</column>

---

You loathe the [alghollthus](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=1) and their mind magic, and you’ve been trained to be willing to die rather than give into mental manipulation. If you would start your turn [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5), [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6), or [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) due to a failed Will save, you can attempt a Will save against the same DC; on a success, you become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) until your next turn, rather than act against your will.
name: Defiance Unto Death
